text: Thomas Muster was the defending champion, but did not participate this year. Marcelo Ríos won the title, defeating Andre Agassi 7-5, 6-3, 6-4 in the final. == Seeds == All thirty-two seeds received a bye to the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ===Bottom Half=== ====Section 5==== ====Section 6==== ====Section 7==== ====Section 8==== == References == * 1998 Lipton Championships Draw Men's Singles
title: 1998 Lipton Championships – Men's Singles
